nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
+        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
+        <version>2.3.1.RELEASE</version>
+        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
+    </parent>
+    <groupId>com.futurewei.alcor</groupId>
+    <artifactId>network-acl-manager</artifactId>
+    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    <name>AlcorNetworkAclManager</name>
+    <description>Alcor Network ACL Manager Module</description>
+
+    <properties>
+        <java.version>1.8</java.version>
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
+            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
+            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
+            <scope>test</scope>
+            <exclusions>
+                <exclusion>
+                    <groupId>org.junit.vintage</groupId>
+                    <artifactId>junit-vintage-engine</artifactId>
+                </exclusion>
+            </exclusions>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <!--Internal dependencies-->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>com.futurewei.alcor</groupId>
+            <artifactId>common</artifactId>
+            <version>0.1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+            <scope>compile</scope>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>com.futurewei.alcor</groupId>
+            <artifactId>web</artifactId>
+            <version>0.1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+            <scope>compile</scope>
+        </dependency>
+    </dependencies>
+
+    <build>
+        <plugins>
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
+                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+            </plugin>
+        </plugins>
+    </build>

nodes.bodyText: Also, add this new service to the alcor pom file as well.

nodes.bodyText:
Could you please add swagger/SwaggerJsonTest.java to the NACL UT?
One example is https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor/blob/master/services/security_group_manager/src/test/java/com/futurewei/alcor/securitygroup/swagger/SwaggerJsonTest.java.

nodes.bodyText:
server.port=9008
This is the default port for NACL manager. The default port for other services could be referred to https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor/blob/master/services/port_manager/src/main/resources/application.properties (updated recently)
This will help to avoid port conflict for e2e integration.
As usual, could you please create a doc for this new microservice? Thank you.
Inline： Use space instead of tab.
We've upgraded to Java 11. Please change it accordingly.

nodes.bodyText:
One important comment :-)
Can you add @DurationStatistics to NACL mgr?
Checking to see what the impact is.
9008 is used by SGM. Could you change it to 9013?
